name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Minecraft Version
name_original: Five Nights at Freddy's: Minecraft Version
description:
ENGLISH: FIVE NIGHTS AT FREDDY'S BUT VERSION MINECRAFT, FNAF 1 MINECRAFT VERSION I NEVER FOUND, SO I DECIDED TO MAKE THIS GAME.

WILL NOT CHANGE ALMOST NOTHING FROM THE ORIGINAL GAME, ONLY THE SCENARIO AND A FEW APPEARANCES.

PT-BR: FIVE NIGHTS AT FREDDY'S SÓ QUE VERSÃO MINECRAFT, NUNCA VI FNAF 1 NESSA VERSÃO DE MINECRAFT, ENTÃO RESOLVI FAZER ESSE JOGO.

NÃO VAI MUDAR QUASE NADA DO JOGO ORIGINAL, SÓ O CENARIO E UMAS PERSONALIZASÕES.
